short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cut your way through COVID! This addon replaces some of the corona posts with space news. Just look for the rocket icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you feel tired of your Facebook feed talking only about corona, this add-on will replace some of the posts with interesting space news. You will find a rocket icon in the place of an ex-coronavirus post. Click on the icon and you will be taken to the space news site.
